languages.text: {n}Азарт в глазах Таддуа тухнет.{/n} "Милосердное решение, Звездное Сиятельство. Вкусившие дар свободы, данной нам держащим Ключ всех Судеб и его Посланни{mf|ком|цей}, вы, отродье, можете быть свободны. Ступайте же!"

traits.locale_text: "Милосердное решение, Ваше Звездное Сиятельство. Прозревшая истину, вкусившая дар свободы, данной нам Небесным Всеотцом и его Посланником, ты можешь быть свободна. Ступай!"

languages.text: {n}The excitement in Taddua's eyes fades away.{/n} "A merciful decision, Your Celestial Highness. Savour the gift of freedom bestowed on us by the Holder of the Key to all Destinies and by His messenger. Begone, you disgusting spawn!"
languages.original_text: {n}Азарт в глазах Таддуа тухнет.{/n} "Милосердное решение, Звездное Сиятельство. Вкусившие дар свободы, данной нам держащим Ключ всех Судеб и его Посланни{mf|ком|цей}, вы, отродье, можете быть свободны. Ступайте же!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The excitement in Ursus's eyes fades away.{/n} "A merciful decision, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Having tasted the gift of freedom bestowed to us by the Holder of the Key of All Destinies and his Messenger, you creatures are free to go. Now scram!"

{n}The excitement in Ursus's eyes fades away.{/n} "A merciful decision, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Having tasted the gift of freedom bestowed to us by the Holder of the Key of All Destinies and his Messenger, you creatures are free to go. Now scram!"

{n}The excitement in Ursus's eyes fades away.{/n} "A merciful decision, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Having tasted the gift of freedom bestowed on us by the Holder of the Key of All Destinies and this his Messenger, you creatures are free to go. Now scram!"

{n}The excitement in Ursus's eyes fades away.{/n} "A merciful decision, Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}. Having tasted the gift of freedom bestowed on us by the Holder of the Key of All Destinies and this his Messenger, you creatures are free to go. Now scram!"

{n}The excitement in Taddua's eyes fades away.{/n} "A merciful decision, Your Celestial Highness. Savour the gift of freedom bestowed on us by the Holder of the Key to all Destinies and by His messenger. Begone, you disgusting spawn!"

{n}The excitement in Taddua's eyes fades away.{/n} "A merciful decision, Your Celestial Highness. Savour the gift of freedom bestowed on us by the Holder of the Key to all Destinies and by His messenger. Begone, you disgusting spawn!"

{n}The excitement in Taddua's eyes fades away.{/n} "A merciful decision, Your Celestial Highness. Savour the gift of freedom bestowed on us by the Holder of the Key to all Destinies and by His messenger. Begone, you disgusting spawn!"

languages.text: {n}塔杜亚眼中兴奋的火焰熄灭了。{/n}“真是个仁慈的决定，来自上界的大人。万千命运之钥的持有者，帝皇的神圣信使，赐予了我们自由的礼物，好好品味这份礼物吧。至于你们这些令人恶心的畜生，赶紧滚！”
languages.original_text: {n}The excitement in Taddua's eyes fades away.{/n} "A merciful decision, Your Celestial Highness. Savour the gift of freedom bestowed on us by the Holder of the Key to all Destinies and by His messenger. Begone, you disgusting spawn!"

traits.locale_text: {n}塔杜亚眼中兴奋的火焰熄灭了。{/n}“真是个仁慈的决定，来自上界的大人。万千命运之钥的持有者，帝皇的神圣信使，赐予了我们自由的礼物，好好品味这份礼物吧。至于你们这些令人恶心的畜生，赶紧滚！”
{n}乌苏斯眼中兴奋的火焰熄灭了。{/n}“真是个仁慈的决定，来自上界的大人。万千命运之钥的持有者，帝皇的神圣信使，赐予了我们自由的礼物，好好品味这份礼物吧。至于你们这些令人恶心的畜生，赶紧滚！”

languages.text: {n}La emoción se desvanece de la cara de Taddua.{/n} «Una decisión piadosa, Excelencia Celestial. Saboree el regalo de la libertad que nos ha concedido el portador de la Llave de todos los Destinos y Su {mf|ínclito mensajero|ínclita mensajera}. ¡Vete de aquí, engendro repugnante!».
languages.original_text: {n}The excitement in Taddua's eyes fades away.{/n} "A merciful decision, Your Celestial Highness. Savour the gift of freedom bestowed on us by the Holder of the Key to all Destinies and by His messenger. Begone, you disgusting spawn!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La emoción se desvanece de la cara de Taddua.{/n} «Una decisión piadosa, Excelencia Celestial. Saboree el regalo de la libertad que nos ha concedido el portador de la Llave de todos los Destinos y Su {mf|ínclito mensajero|ínclita mensajera}. ¡Vete de aquí, engendro repugnante!».

{n}La emoción se desvanece de la cara de Ursus.{/n} «Una decisión piadosa, Excelencia Celestial. Saboree el regalo de la libertad que nos ha concedido el portador de la Llave de todos los Destinos y Su {mf|ínclito mensajero|ínclita mensajera}. ¡Vete de aquí, engendro repugnante!».

languages.text: {n}Taddua'nın gözlerindeki heyecan sönüyor.{/n} "Merhametli bir karar Semavi Efendimiz. Tüm Kaderlerin Anahtarı'nı Elinde Tutan ve O'nun elçisi tarafından bize bahşedilen özgürlük armağanının tadını çıkarın. Defolun iğrenç yaratıklar!"
languages.original_text: {n}The excitement in Taddua's eyes fades away.{/n} "A merciful decision, Your Celestial Highness. Savour the gift of freedom bestowed on us by the Holder of the Key to all Destinies and by His messenger. Begone, you disgusting spawn!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Taddua'nın gözlerindeki heyecan sönüyor.{/n} "Merhametli bir karar Semavi Efendimiz. Tüm Kaderlerin Anahtarı'nı Elinde Tutan ve O'nun elçisi tarafından bize bahşedilen özgürlük armağanının tadını çıkarın. Defolun iğrenç yaratıklar!"

{n}Ursus'un gözlerindeki heyecan sönüyor.{/n} "Merhametli bir karar Semavi Efendimiz. Tüm Kaderlerin Anahtarı'nı Elinde Tutan ve O'nun elçisi tarafından bize bahşedilen özgürlük armağanının tadını çıkarın. Defolun iğrenç yaratıklar!"

languages.text: {n}タッドゥアの目の中の興奮は消える。{/n}「天の閣下、慈悲深い決断ですね。すべての運命の鍵をお持ちの方とその使者によって私たちに授けられた自由の贈り物を味わうがいい、この気持ちの悪い落とし子め！」
languages.original_text: {n}The excitement in Taddua's eyes fades away.{/n} "A merciful decision, Your Celestial Highness. Savour the gift of freedom bestowed on us by the Holder of the Key to all Destinies and by His messenger. Begone, you disgusting spawn!"

traits.locale_text: {n}アーサスの目の中の興奮は消える。{/n}「天の閣下、慈悲深い決断ですね。すべての運命の鍵をお持ちの方とその使者によって私たちに授けられた自由の贈り物を味わうがいい、この気持ちの悪い落とし子め！」
{n}アーサスの目の中の興奮は消える。{/n}「天の閣下、慈悲深い決断ですね。すべての運命の鍵をお持ちの方とその使者によって私たちに授けられた自由の贈り物を味わうがいい、この気持ちの悪い落とし子め！」

languages.text: {n}L'excitation qui animait le regard de Taddua retombe subitement.{/n} « Une décision miséricordieuse, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Savourez le don de la liberté qui vous est accordé par le Détenteur des Clés de la Destinée et Son auguste {mf|messager|messagère}. Disparaissez, cafards répugnants ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The excitement in Taddua's eyes fades away.{/n} "A merciful decision, Your Celestial Highness. Savour the gift of freedom bestowed on us by the Holder of the Key to all Destinies and by His messenger. Begone, you disgusting spawn!"

traits.locale_text: {n}L'excitation qui animait le regard de Taddua retombe subitement.{/n} « Une décision miséricordieuse, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Savourez le don de la liberté qui vous est accordé par le Détenteur des Clés de la Destinée et Son auguste {mf|messager|messagère}. Disparaissez, cafards répugnants ! »

{n}L'excitation qui animait le regard d'Ursus retombe subitement.{/n} « Une décision miséricordieuse, Votre Altesse Célestissime. Savourez le don de la liberté qui vous est accordé par le Détenteur des Clés de la Destinée et Son auguste {mf|messager|messagère}. Disparaissez, cafards répugnants ! »

languages.text: {n}Die Aufregung in Tadduas Augen verblasst.{/n} "Eine gnädige Entscheidung, Eure himmlische Hoheit. Genießt das Geschenk der Freiheit, das der Besitzer des Schlüssels zu allen Schicksalen und {mf|Sein Bote|Seine Botin} uns gewährt haben. Verschwindet, Ihr widerwärtige Missgeburt!"
languages.original_text: {n}The excitement in Taddua's eyes fades away.{/n} "A merciful decision, Your Celestial Highness. Savour the gift of freedom bestowed on us by the Holder of the Key to all Destinies and by His messenger. Begone, you disgusting spawn!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Aufregung in Tadduas Augen verblasst.{/n} "Eine gnädige Entscheidung, Eure himmlische Hoheit. Genießt das Geschenk der Freiheit, das der Besitzer des Schlüssels zu allen Schicksalen und {mf|Sein Bote|Seine Botin} uns gewährt haben. Verschwindet, Ihr widerwärtige Missgeburt!"

{n}Die Aufregung in Ursus' Augen verblasst.{/n} "Eine gnädige Entscheidung, Eure himmlische Hoheit. Genießt das Geschenk der Freiheit, das der Besitzer des Schlüssels zu allen Schicksalen und {mf|Sein Bote|Seine Botin} uns gewährt haben. Verschwindet, Ihr widerwärtige Missgeburt!"
